English.Text: Horror! The bullet passes through flesh and blood!" "Patricia!...Patricia!" wails the illusionist, as he rushes from the wings to be beside the actress; his dying wife, "oh lord! Whatever have you done sirs!" Shortly after, she dies in his arms. That your soldiers were duped by a bit of make-up and a costume doesn't say much for their judgement. The expedition leaves the poor man and his tragic theatre set, and departs into the rain, which seems to fall harder and louder than ever before.
